data.name: Sins From Magdala
data.detailed_description:
A setting from the 1st century A.D. is the cover letter of Sins From Magdala , in true escape room style, we are going to have to solve 7 enigmas hidden in each corner of its rooms, each one related to a different deadly sin . And as background the story of the "controversial" figure of Mary Magdalene . Using as a basis the biblical verses in which it refers to the 7 demons that Jesus expelled from her :



To solve them we must analyze each of the 7 sins and make use of our virtues as human beings to correct what is wrong with us and know how to dominate the 7 demons that govern us , through different types of puzzles: visual, logical and of skill . In turn, we will get the 7 stones of sins that will free us from them and we will be able to escape from what had us held.



If you are a fan of puzzle games, come and enter the wonderful city of Magdala.
